name: Skhelly
description:
This is my game, Skhelly, it's a work in progress however my vision for it is to eventually create an action platformer about a skeleton in hell attempting to both escape hell and figure out why they're there in the first place, for now there is not much a dev room and a small tutorial level to help get used to Skhelly's unique movement mechanics. Play either in the browser directly or download a copy!

CURRENT DIFFERENCES:

  • EXE version can have infinite amounts of bones in game
  • EXE version has constant physics through out entire level
  • HTML version is generally a bit buggy
